logger.doc:name: Log PERSON being Published
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { target: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received through HTTP request.", operation: attributes.queryParams."operation" default "NOOPERATION" }]

amqp:message.amqp:headers: #[%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { operation: attributes.queryParams."operation", delay: (attributes.queryParams."delay" default "0") }]

ee:transform.doc:name: Set vars for person , headers from AMQP MSG and save ackToken value

logger.doc:name: Log Person MSG
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received from the queue.", operation: vars.operation }]

logger.doc:name: Log NOACTION
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "") ++ " not acked but received succesfully" }]

logger.doc:name: Log REJECTED
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " rejected." }]

logger.doc:name: Log ERROR
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received with errors." }]

raise-error.doc:name: Raise error Person is Blocked
raise-error.description: This person is not allowed to be inserted on the system.

logger.doc:name: Log DELAY
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received for delayed insertion.", delay: vars.delay }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 import * from dw::Runtime output application/java --- payload wait (vars.delay default 5000)

logger.doc:name: Log FINISH DELAYED
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " finished the delayed processing.", delay: vars.delay }]

logger.doc:name: Log DEFAULT(EVERYTHING ELSE)
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "") ++ " accepted succesfully" }]

logger.doc:name: Log REJECT by ERROR THROWN
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Message Rejected by Exhaustion of Error Thrown.", details: error.description default "NODESCRIPTION" }]

logger.doc:name: Log ERROR THROWN
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " thrown an error.", details: error.description default "NODESCRIPTION" }]
